scripts.resetProgressTable: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteProgressTable.js, && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createProgressTable.js, && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateProgressTable.js
scripts.resetDiaryTable: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/deleteDiaryTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createDiaryTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateDiaryTable.js
